name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live ＂STELLAR into the GALAXY＂ Supported By Bushiroad [LtqzI9y5yII]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performing 'GHOST' at her 1st solo live.
Bridge and climax of 'GHOST' with visual effects.
Performance of Hoshimachi Suisei's signature song 'Stellar Stellar'.
Performance of 'Bye Bye Rainy' as part of the live medley.
Returning to 'Stellar Stellar' for the segment conclusion.

subtitles.original: 透明できっと不恰好だけれど
subtitles.english: Translucent and surely ungraceful,

subtitles.original: でも
subtitles.english: But...

subtitles.original: だから叫んで 喘いで
subtitles.english: That's why I'm screaming, struggling,

subtitles.original: 裸足のまま走ってね
subtitles.english: Running barefoot.

subtitles.original: 気付いて教えてよ
subtitles.english: Please notice and tell me,

subtitles.original: 答えは
subtitles.english: The answer is...

subtitles.original: こんな
subtitles.english: Like this,

subtitles.original: 僕の心まで透明にしないで
subtitles.english: Please don't make even my heart transparent.

subtitles.original: 灰色の街が笑ってる
subtitles.english: The grey city is laughing,

subtitles.original: 足取り重くなる
subtitles.english: My footsteps are getting heavy.

subtitles.original: 声を枯らして叫んで喘いで裸足で走り続けて
subtitles.english: With a withered voice, screaming, struggling, continuing to run barefoot,

subtitles.original: 変わらないように
subtitles.english: So that nothing changes,

subtitles.original: 諦めないように
subtitles.english: So that I don't give up,

subtitles.original: 爪を立て続けるだけだ
subtitles.english: I'll just keep digging my claws in.

subtitles.original: 見つけてよ僕を
subtitles.english: Please find me,

subtitles.original: 僕の声が聞こえてる
subtitles.english: Can you hear my voice?

subtitles.original: 残像 雑踏 シルエットすらも
subtitles.english: Afterimages, crowds, even the silhouettes,

subtitles.original: 透明できっと不恰好だけれどでも
subtitles.english: Are translucent and surely ungraceful, but...

subtitles.original: せめて声を枯らそう
subtitles.english: At least I'll let my voice wither away,

subtitles.original: 必死に縋って求めて
subtitles.english: Clinging desperately, seeking,

subtitles.original: そばに願う姿見たいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to see the figure I wish to be beside me.

subtitles.original: Stellar Stellar!
subtitles.english: Stellar Stellar!

subtitles.original: もっともっと！
subtitles.english: More, more!

subtitles.original: 本音も建前も 駆け引き上手な大人はダメね
subtitles.english: True feelings and pretenses, adults good at bargaining are no good, right?

subtitles.original: そんな言葉使用できない できない
subtitles.english: Those kinds of words, I can't use them, I can't.

subtitles.original: 便利で快適で進化し続けてるテクノロジー
subtitles.english: Convenient, comfortable, and ever-evolving technology,

subtitles.original: 伝えて人肌の温もり
subtitles.english: Convey the warmth of human skin.

subtitles.original: ねえこのままずっと降り止まない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: Hey, it's a world of rain that won't stop falling like this forever,

subtitles.original: もう悲しくない 人はなれる生き物だから
subtitles.english: I'm not sad anymore, because humans are creatures that can adapt.

subtitles.original: 総白になった青春の1ページ目だっけ
subtitles.english: Was it the first page of my youth that turned completely white?

subtitles.original: 今君に会いたいと涙込み上げる
subtitles.english: Now I want to see you, and tears well up.

subtitles.original: 踏んだり蹴ったり注意散漫人生の天気が
subtitles.english: Ups and downs, distracted, the weather of life is...

subtitles.original: 嵐 新しい時代を乗りこなして行くんだ
subtitles.english: A storm, I'm going to master this new era.

subtitles.original: 透明で鮮明で叫び声上げるマイノリティ
subtitles.english: Translucent and vivid, a minority raising a scream,

subtitles.original: 失敗しては笑ってく
subtitles.english: Laughing as I fail.

subtitles.original: もうこのままずっと降り止まない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: Already, it's a world of rain that won't stop falling like this forever,

subtitles.original: 愛するしかない それしかない器用じゃないから
subtitles.english: I have no choice but to love, that's all there is, because I'm not clever enough.

subtitles.original: 総白になった青春の1ページ目だっけ
subtitles.english: Was it the first page of my youth that turned completely white?

subtitles.original: 忘れ物思い出せないまま忘れそう
subtitles.english: I'm about to forget the things I lost without being able to remember them,

subtitles.original: このままじゃ
subtitles.english: If things stay like this...

subtitles.original: 風の形見えない 見えないよあなたが
subtitles.english: The shape of the wind is invisible, I can't see you,

subtitles.original: あなただって同じ じっとしてられない
subtitles.english: You're the same, you can't stay still.

subtitles.original: 動き出すよ この身駆けて 降参ないよ
subtitles.english: I'll start moving, putting my life on the line, I won't surrender,

subtitles.original: 泣いたってしょうがないさ
subtitles.english: It's no use crying.

subtitles.original: ねえこのままずっと降り止まない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: Hey, it's a world of rain that won't stop falling like this forever,

subtitles.original: もう悲しくない 人はなれる生き物だから
subtitles.english: I'm not sad anymore, because humans are creatures that can adapt.

subtitles.original: 総白になった青春の
subtitles.english: Of my youth that turned completely white...
